meanings.definition: Material that is ejected or thrown out
meanings.sent1: The volcano's ejecta covered the surrounding area.
meanings.sent2: The astronaut observed the ejecta from the rocket launch.
meanings.sent3: The ejecta from the popcorn machine made a mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The storm's ejecta of leaves and branches littered the yard.
meanings.sent5: The ejecta of glitter from the craft project sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The sudden ejecta of water from the hose surprised me.
meanings.sent2: The ejecta of coins from the vending machine was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The ejecta of confetti at the party added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The ejecta of ideas from the brainstorming session was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The ejecta of confessions during the truth game shocked everyone.
